    java.io.Serializable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used to represent a Board
    Author:
    Matteo Gagliano, Carmelo Fascella, Generoso Imparato

      java.util.List<Die> getDiceOnColumn​(int col)
      Returns an ArrayList of Dice placed in a column passed by parameter; if the index is out of range.sagradaschemecard, returns an empty ArrayList
      java.util.List<Die> getDiceOnRow​(int row)
      Returns an ArrayList of dice placed in a row passed by parameter; if the index is out of range.sagradaschemecard, returns an empty ArrayList

      Returns a Die given its coordinates; null if the coordinates are not valid or the Die is not present at (row,column) position
      int getDieColumn​(Die die)
      If the Die is on the Board returns the column of the matrix associated with the Board, else return -1

      If the Die is on the Board returns the row of the matrix associated with the Board, else returns -1

      • addDie

        public void addDie​(Die die,
                   int row,
                   int column,
                   boolean ignoreValueRestriction,
                   boolean ignoreColorRestriction,
                   boolean ignoreAdjacentRestriction)
            throws ChangeModelStateException,
                   ActionNotPossibleException
        Tries to add a Die in a position decided by the given coordinates (row,column) if it is possible
        Parameters:
        die - Die that can be added to the Board
        row - row of the matrix associated with the Board
        column - column of the matrix associated with the Board
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if the die cannot be added
        ActionNotPossibleException

        column - column of the matrix of dice associated with the Board
        Returns:

      • getDiceOnColumn

        public java.util.List<Die> getDiceOnColumn​(int col)
        Returns an ArrayList of Dice placed in a column passed by parameter; if the index is out of range.sagradaschemecard, returns an empty ArrayList
        Parameters:
        col - column of the matrix of dice associated with the Board
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of dice placed in the same column of the matrix of the Board; an empty ArrayList if the index is not accepted

        Returns:

      • getDie

        public Die getDie​(int row,
                  int column)
        Returns a Die given its coordinates; null if the coordinates are not valid or the Die is not present at (row,column) position
        Parameters:
        row - row of the matrix of dice associated with the Board
        column - column of the matrix of dice associated with the Board
        Returns:
        a Die placed in (row,column) coordinates; null if the coordinates are not accepted or the Die is not placed

      • getDieColumn

        public int getDieColumn​(Die die)
        If the Die is on the Board returns the column of the matrix associated with the Board, else return -1
        Parameters:
        die - Die to search on the Board
        Returns:
        column of the matrix where the Die is placed; -1 if the Die is not placed

        Returns:
        row of the matrix where the Die is placed; -1 if the Die is not placed
